casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Bugert, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Bugert (1999), 87 Ohio St.3d 253.]

(No. 98-2475 Submitted November 3, 1999 Decided December 1, 1999.) Julia R. Bates, Lucas County Prosecuting Attorney, and Eric A. Baum, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. Alan S. Konop, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Conyers (1999), 87 Ohio St.3d 246, 719 N.E.2d 535.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
